entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 March 2023
